column2: We have control of all of our cores, we can now dominate the rest of Arcadia
We have control of all of our cores, we can now dominate the rest of Arcadia
We have control of all of our cores, we can now dominate the rest of Arcadia

We have control of all of Arcadia, we have reached the Arcadian Dream! §GNote: You will get the South American immgration flag now, meaning you will get immigration year round and compete against both continents!
We can now fully guarantee the rights of the Afro Arcadians
From sea to shining sea, we proclaim all shall be under the Arcadian banner!
We have Italy under our control, we can create the kingdom of Aragon-Italy
We have control of Venice, and can now bring them into our Empire
We hereby proclaim us as a son of Rome, and we will use this claim to connect our Iberian lands to Italy!
We can now form Aryanam and expand our claims all over the Middle East!
We have control of all of Ameriga, we can form the Federation!
We can now fully guarantee the rights of the Afro Amerigans
Now that we are the Federation, our claims extend into the Amazon!
Beornia has been a thorn in our side, but no longer, we can now integrate the nation into our own.
It is our destiny to unify all of Ameriga under the Federation, and we have set ourselves up to achieve this dream.
We have freed the Granadans from their oppression, we can now accept them into our Federation.

We have consolidated our control over the Elbian region, we can now form a confederation of the Elbian states!

§GYou can form the Elbians by Sphereing or Conquering the following Countries:

§GThuringia
Brandenburg
Brunswick
Hanover\Bremen
Pomerania
Holstein

§!OR

§GBrandenburg
Thuringia
Brunswick
Hanover
Bremen
Lippe-Detmold
Hesse-Kassel
Oldenburg
East Frisia
While not an offical part of the HRE, there are enough ethinic Germans to solidify our claim to the region.
We have freed the Rheinish from their oppression, we can now accept them into our nation.
We have controled the Rhineland long enough to be able to integrate the Rhenish people into our nation.

The Holy Roman Empire could have been the greatest power of the continent if it had been united. The previous emperor tried to centralize the various principalities during the Revolution but the Great German War forced him to withdraw its claims. But now we are strong enough to try the adventure once more and this time, maybe we will establish a Reich that will last a Thousand Years!

§GYou can form the HRE by owning or sphering all German states EXCEPT Rhineland, Holstein, and Prussia. §R

The time limit for forming the HRE will run out after the liberal revolutions in 1848.
Despite our efforts, the princes of the Empire did not accept our claim. We defeated them and we can rightfully be recognized Kaiser by the Germans ! Ein Reich, Ein Deustchland !
The Boers of South Africa are essentially just Dutch, we should accept them into our nation.
We have freed the previous slave from their oppression, we can now accept them into our nation.
We have freed the Caribeans from their oppression, we can now accept them into our nation.
We are now in a position to fully embrace any immigrant into our nation, we should expect new policies to increase immigration.
The War for Liberation is now long behind us, we can now end the presidential dictatorship and reform our government.
We are now in a position to fully embrace any immigrant into our nation, we should expect new policies to increase immigration.
We are now in a position to fully embrace any immigrant into our nation, we should expect new policies to increase immigration.
WARNING: Mutually exclusive with other paths, enables future decisions to core and accept Scotland.\n\n§GYou also instantly will buff up English AND Irish Cores to 35 LR.

WARNING: Mutually exclusive with other paths, enables future decisions to core parts of Burgundy and Provence.

§GYou also instantly will buff up French Cores to 35 LR§!

(This does not include Occitania, heads up).

WARNING: Mutually exclusive with other paths, strongest path with all coring and accepting decisions, along with accepting all cultures in 1870.

§RHowever you will be stuck at 32 LR across your entire nation until 1875§!

Then you will get 35 in French and English cores!
Years of the Anglois Dilemma have plagued the country, but no more. We can now fully integrate all cultures of the Dual Monarchy.
The isles are rightfully ours, and Scotland and its people are no different.
The Burgundian menance has been pushed back, and thus the french lands are now ours once again.
We have crushed the pretenders in Provence, and can integrate the final part of Occitania.

While we have had our differences with the Occitans, due to their loyalty to the Valois cause, we have much bigger problems in Europe that threatens our very existence...We need to mobilize our cousins to protect our shared Kingdom!
The Irish has always been a royal pain, but with our focus squarely on the Isles we've slowly eroded their belief of being mistreated and forgotten. They'll now be an integral part of our society!
We shall now lead the Muslim world ourselves!
Through great diplomancy and war, we can now claim to be a Federation for all Germans.
The time to push North is upon us! Down with the Bohemians, the false rulers of Germania!
Through all odds, we have done it. Germany is united under a German leader. Hail Germania!
Once ours under a personal union, Croatia slipped from our grasp. Let us correct this mistake.
Now that Croatia is fully under our control, we can now integrate the Croatians into our nation.
With all of Romania under our control, we can now integrate the Romanians into our nation.
With all of Serbia under our control, we can now integrate the Serbians into our nation.
We have reclaimed our rightful land, we must push on further north to secure our position.
We have full control of the North of Italy, which is enough to form a proper nation of Italy.
We have returned home, it is time to embrace our old colors.
We can now move our capital back to our original home.
Now that we are fully home, we should look to reinvigorate the nation with infastructural improvements.
The time for vassal states is no more, we need full control over all of our core land.
A large part of our population is Ruthenian, so we should look to integrate them fully into the nation.
Lithuanians have been a central part of the Commonwealth for some time, we can use this to claim ourselves protectors of ALL baltic people.
The days of petty slavic squabbling are over, we have finally united all Russians under one banner.
Ruthenians are the brothers to Russians, they must be integrated into the nation.
Once upon a time, Russians controlled the borderlands. We must return our rule over these lands, and go even further if possible.
The German coastline has been under our control and influence for some time now. The Pomeranian peoples have close ties to the Nordic people and should be treated as full citizens.
Now that the Pomeranians are proper citizens of our empire, we shall extend our claims into the coastline of Prussia.
The Bohemians have tried and failed to stop our Elbian ambition. We shall extend our claims to all of Elbia! §RWARNING: Mutually exclusive with the Claim Ireland decision.§!
We proclaim ourselves masters of the baltics! §RWARNING: Mutually exclusive with the Claim Ireland decision.§!
WARNING: This is mutually exclusive with Nordtyskland and Baltic Empires decisions.
§RWARNING: MUTALLY EXCLUSIVE WITH NEW WORLD PATH.§! We now control all of Iberia, and thus can proclaim ourselves a proper union!
§RWARNING: This is mutally exclusive with Keep Capital in Istanbul. §!You will be able to accept Misri and Bedouin.
§RWARNING: This is mutally exclusive with Move Capital to Ankara. §!You will be able to accept Greek, Bulgarian, Albanian, Serbian, Croatian and core these lands.
Lets you start with some generals.
We have complete control over France, we can now extend our claims over it!
We have complete control over Korea once again for some time now, we can now extend our claims over it!
We have complete control over Greece, we can now accept the Greeks!
Some time has passed since we have picked a cultural focus for our nation, we can now end the assimilation troubles we have been having.

Some time has passed since we have picked a cultural focus for our nation, we can now end the assimilation troubles we have been having. We also will increase the Life Rating in French and English cores to 35.
We have freed the Caribeans from their oppression, we can now accept them into our nation.
We have freed the Caribeans from their oppression, we can now accept them into our nation.

With our foothold in Arcadia secured, we must integrate these lands even closer to our homelands so we can build the strongest navy the world has never seen. All of the Pacific will be ours and the Westerners will fear our wrath! §G(This will enable a Canal allowing you to cross over into Alaska from Siberia, who needs connected to Asia when you have connected to America?)

The Chinese colonists founded the Xifang federation a long time ago and since then it has developed into a full-fledged country. But somehow they stand in way of establishing total control over the Pacific...We must invade!
Our Viceroyalty of Mexico has done well enough civilizing Arcadia. We should integrate them as a core department of Spain! §RWARNING: This can be done only once.
Our Viceroyalty of Granada has done well enough civilizing Ameriga. We should integrate them as a core department of Spain! §RWARNING: This can be done only once.
Our Viceroyalty of Quito has done well enough civilizing Ameriga. We should integrate them as a core department of Spain! §RWARNING: This can be done only once.
Our Viceroyalty of San Salvador has done well enough civilizing Arcadia. We should integrate them as a core department of Spain! §RWARNING: This can be done only once.

The old memory of rebellion has been extinguished from our colonies. Now with the age of nationalism it's clear that we are all one people, one race, the Hispanic people of the Indies are Spanish as well!

§RWARNING: MUTALLY EXCLUSIVE WITH IBERIA.\n\n§!Our hold on Colombia is clearly a success. To raise our status among the European Powers and also in our colonies, we can crown our King, ""Emperor de las Indias Occidentales"" and thus give him a special place in the Royal Families of the Old Continent

We are descendents of the many colonies founded by Zeng He, although our priorites are not united and we are split into 2 factions. We should listen to the Dong Guo faction: They emphasize a focus on the Pacific!\n\n§GOur capital will stay in Zeng He (Australia) and we will be able to get connected ports in Indonesia!

We are descendents of the many colonies founded by Zeng He, although our priorites are not united and we are split into 2 factions. We should listen to the Gan Guo faction: They emphasize a focus on Arcadia!\n\n§GWe will be able to get Lusitanian accepted, get an Immigration buff, and our Capital will be moved to Sanbao in Arcadia.

Zeng He made many colonies across Nusantara and Indochina, however they have been occupied by local powers for centuries. An important step to securing naval dominance wil be the Island of New Guinea!\n\n§G(This will also build a strait to New Guinea and by extension Indonesia!)
We've had a long history of cooperation and trade with the Lusitanians, we clearly should secure them under proper Chinese rule and expand our reach on Arcadia!
The age of the steppe warriors is over. However, if we could unite the khanates of the European steppe, it would be a fitting tribute to their legacy, and a counter to growing Russian nationalism.

In order to survive as as a nation-state, we Tatars will have to give up our nomadic lifestyles. By encouraging aggressive demographic policies (fertility for everyone!) and especially developing our great cities, we can increase our population enough to prevent Russian incursions on our territory.
